channel.title: A little nooby help
channel.description:
How's it going, I've been away from computers altogether for along time and need a little bit of nooby help.
Just wondering, when I compile [edit] and run it says: [code]'java; is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code]
How can I fix this? Cheers.

item.title: A little nooby help
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

This is against rule 2. Please read the rules next time.

Read full topic
